description:
**COURSE UPDATED JANUARY 2016**

Hello Students,

If you have no idea how to market your products on the Internet, or worse…

You’ve researched just how to write your own copy, but you still aren’t getting the conversions…

Or you know about the powerful conversion benefits of the Video Sales Letter versus a traditional sales letter upwards of 200% or more*, but you struggle applying that knowledge to create your own video marketing…

If you're looking to avoid any roundabout method to creating any video marketing and would prefer a straightforward, proven approach... keep reading and relax. You can take a deep breath now. You’re in the right place.

Video Sales Letters for Marketers: Building VSLs From A-To-Z is the ultimate guide to boosting your online sales to the stratosphere, from the realm of mediocre to uber successful... and build it in one hour.

This course will show you the exact methods that the best in the business utilize as well as newly formed information to craft a VSL unlike any other… in one hour.

What would you do with a 200% increase on your conversions?*

A simple Video Sales Letter marketing or landing page has the ability to convert much higher than a traditional sales letter if only for the fact that you can add the element of audio and video to your sales presentation to engage your audience unlike any other form of sales.

And when you better engage your audience towards a click of action, you can convert higher than ever before.

From the 3 As of ATTENTION, AUTHENTICITY and ACTION, to the B.E.N. Formula, from a copy and paste VSL Template to the essential steps to build a landing page, this course covers it all for you.

So, become a VSL Master by taking Video Sales Letters for Marketers: Building VSLs From A-To-Z


*While conversion results cannot be guaranteed, video sales letters continually outperform traditional copy and sales pages virtually every time.
title: Video Sales Letters For Marketers: Building VSLs from A-To-Z
